content.description: A short and fun problem In the Stranded Boulders area.  Definitely not the type of thing you go out of your way to do, but If you on a SUP or just bored at the beach giving it a try Is worth it.  Starts off with the Obvious foothold, and follows the "slice" to the top of the boulder.Falling will leave you in shallow water between two rocks, making protection unavailable.A V2(?) variation is available with a "sit start" where your tush sits on top of the water while holding an undercling.
content.location: The smaller of the two large rock Islands off of the Northern beach.

content.description: Just off the coast of the harbor, a few rocks protrude from the water, often in odd formations.  These boulders are only accessible via boat or swimming.
